Title: ESTATE GUCCI BRIEFCASE W CROSSBODY BAG STRAP, SOFT BLACK LEATHER, W PACKAGING
Description: Genuine Gucci Leather Bag with Crossbody Strap, can be used as a messenger bag or briefcase.Beautiful soft grain leather in a structured bag with retractable handles.Bag has full front exterior pocket with card holder on one side, and full front exterior pocket on the other side.Bag interior has two square 5.5" pockets on one side and 10"x7" zipper pocket on the other side.Buckle strap is 53" long at shortest and 57" long at longest buckle setting. It is 1 1/8" wide.Strap has shoulder piece, with "Gucci made in Italy" on it.Hardware is a shiny blackened nickel look, all with Gucci engraved on it.Bag comes with dust bag, in the Gucci copper box with tissue, in a Gucci shopping bag.This bag is in very good condition, with no marks or wear on interior and only a few minor wear marks on exterior leather.
